mapper.select: SELECT F.NO , F.TITLE , F.CONTENT , F.ENROLL_DATE , F.DEL_YN , C.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME , A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME FROM FAQ F JOIN ADMIN A ON F.WRITER_NO = A.NO JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY C ON F.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO WHERE F.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY F.NO DESC

SELECT F.NO, F.TITLE, F.CONTENT, F.ENROLL_DATE, F.DEL_YN, C.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME, F.WRITER_NO FROM FAQ F JOIN ADMIN A ON F.WRITER_NO = A.NO JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY C ON F.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO WHERE F.NO = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.delete: UPDATE FAQ SET , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select:

AND F.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND F.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND F.CATEGORY_NO = #{searchValue}
